description: This file defines the DiscoveryDelegate class which provides methods for handling media event account linking, sign-in, sign-out, and entitlement account linking through RPC calls facilitated by an external link obtained via DelegateUtils. It includes functions for encoding/decoding JSON data and interacting with external services related to discovery and account management.

classes.name: DiscoveryDelegate
classes.description: A class responsible for managing discovery and account linking procedures via RPC calls, utilizing a shell context and providing high-level functions for media event, sign-in, sign-out, and entitlement account link handling.

methods.name: uint32_t MediaEventAccountLink(const std::string & appId,const std::string & payload,std::string & result)
methods.description: Handles media event account linking by sending a request with appId and payload, and processes the response into a JSON string.

methods.name: uint32_t SignIn(const std::string & appId,const std::string & entitlements,bool & success)
methods.description: Performs sign-in operation by invoking a remote procedure with appId and entitlements; updates success status based on response.

methods.name: uint32_t SignOut(const std::string & appId,bool & success)
methods.description: Performs sign-out operation similarly to SignIn, updating success based on remote response.

methods.name: uint32_t EntitlementsAccountLink(const std::string & appId,const std::string & payload,std::string & result)
methods.description: Handles account link actions based on 'type' and 'action' labels in payload; supports signIn and signOut actions, returning success status.

ctags.name: EntitlementsAccountLink
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t EntitlementsAccountLink(const std::string& appId, const std::string& payload, s/

ctags.name: MediaEventAccountLink
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t MediaEventAccountLink(const std::string& appId, const std::string& payload, std/

ctags.name: SignIn
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t SignIn(const std::string& appId, const std::string& entitlements, bool& success/

ctags.name: SignOut
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t SignOut(const std::string& appId, bool& success) {$/
